name: Stealth Prototype #02
description:
Description

Find a way around the guard and unlock the mystery of the secret chamber.

Check it out now!

Gameplay Mechanics
  • Pickup important objects found in the environment 
  • Throw items to cause a distraction
  • Hide when the heat is on
  • Sneak through the place without being detected
Features
  • Keyboard and gamepad support
  • Switch between third person and first person mode
  • Adjust control settings
  • Change screen resolution
  • Modify graphics quality
